page.title: 14Children's Games
page.content: The following playground games are played at lunch-times by the children of Woodcote school:- block,skipping,hopscotch,chase,bars, leapfrog,football,orange balls,war, egg bacon and sausage,stick in the mud,lurgi,bundle,spin round,hey presto, oranges and lemons,bulldog and red rover. Bars and bulldog are the most popular. BULLDOG:You need a lot of people in a line. One is in the middle, a little way away, facing them. He calls a name, that person shouts "bulldog" and runs at the person. All the others chase. If he catches any of them they stay with him. He must catch the one whose name he called first.
